instructions:
Heat oven to 350 F. Have 2 cookie sheets ready. Mix flour and baking soda. Beat peanut butter, butter,
sugars and vanilla with electric mixer until fluffy. Beat in eggs. With mixer on low speed gradually beat in
flour mixture just until blended. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart on
ungreased cookie sheets. Bake 7 to 8 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on cookie sheet 1 minute
before removing to rack to cool completely. Store tightly covered. Makes 100 cookies.
ingredients: 2 cups (12 oz pkg) semisweet chocolate chips
name: Peanut-butter Chocolate Chip Cookies
